code: import React from'react';import{onChangedSort}from'../actions';import{connect}from'react-redux';var SelectBox=function SelectBox(_ref){var products=_ref.products,onChangedSort=_ref.onChangedSort,avaiProducts=_ref.avaiProducts;var getInfo=function getInfo(){if(avaiProducts.length>0){return avaiProducts;}else return products;};/* *****************排序：对avaiProducts: ********************************/ /* ----------------------------------------------- */ /* by id 保存avaiproducts副本*/var prdctById=[];for(var i=0;i<getInfo().length;i++){prdctById.push(getInfo()[i]);}prdctById.sort(function(a,b){return a.id-b.id;});console.log('prdctById',prdctById);/* ----------------------------------------------- */ /* by price 价格从低到高排序*/var prdctsByPrice=[];for(var i=0;i<prdctById.length;i++){prdctsByPrice.push(prdctById[i]);}prdctsByPrice.sort(function(a,b){return a.price-b.price;});console.log('ProductsByPrice',prdctsByPrice);/* ----------------------------------------------- */ /* by reverse price 价格从高到低排序*/var reverseprdctByPrice=[];for(var m=prdctsByPrice.length-1;m>=0;m--){reverseprdctByPrice.push(prdctsByPrice[m]);}console.log('reverseprdctByPrice',reverseprdctByPrice);/* ********************************************************************/var avProducts=[prdctById,prdctsByPrice,reverseprdctByPrice];console.log('ppp:',avaiProducts);return React.createElement("select",{style:{width:'200px',height:'35px'},onChange:function onChange(e){return onChangedSort(e,avProducts);}},React.createElement("option",{value:"SELECT"},"select"),React.createElement("option",{value:"HIGHEST_TO_LOWEST"},"Highest to Lowest"),React.createElement("option",{value:"LOWEST_TO_HIGHEST"},"Lowest to Highest"));};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{products:state.products,avaiProducts:state.avaiProducts};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,{onChangedSort:onChangedSort})(SelectBox);
